content.rendered:
Calan Mai is an Australian musician, recently relocated to Manchester. For his latest, folktronic single "Mountain Mountain" he was keen to have some artwork that defied genre stereotypes.

Armed with Google Maps, a stack of brightly coloured paper and my trusty scalpel, I crafted a simple, geometric paper sculpture.

excerpt.rendered: Calan Mai is an Australian musician, recently relocated to Manchester. For his latest, folktronic single “Mountain Mountain” he was keen to have some artwork that defied genre stereotypes.
